mygame.state

Class SagutAppState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.app.state.BaseAppState
      • mygame.state.SagutAppState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.app.state.AppState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameScreenAppState, MainMenuScreenState, SagutGuiState

    public abstract class SagutAppState
extends com.jme3.app.state.BaseAppState
    This is the base (more like boilerplate) class of our AppState. This class will represent the basic cycle of the AppState classes.
